trans-unit.source: This function does not perform any type conversions, including from boolean or CBOR tag. Therefore, it may only be called if isInteger() is true; calling it in any other condition is an error.

trans-unit.source: This function is a Qt implementation of C++17's std::as_const(), a cast function like std::move(). But while std::move() turns lvalues into rvalues, this function turns non-const lvalues into const lvalues. Like std::as_const(), it doesn't work on rvalues, because it cannot be efficiently implemented for rvalues without leaving dangling references.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数是C++17的std::as_const()的Qt实现,是一个类似于std::move()的投射函数,但std::move()把lvalues变成rvalues,这个函数把非const的lvalues变成const的lvalues。但当 std::move()将 lvalues 变成 rvalues 时,这个函数将非const lvalues 变成 const lvalues。像std::as_const()一样,它不能在rvalues上工作,因为它不能有效地实现rvalues而不留下悬而未决的引用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by initialize(). trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph before geometry is rendered to make sure the shader is in the right state.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在几何体渲染之前被场景图调用,以确保着色器处于正确的状态。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph to enable the material to provide a custom set of graphics state. The set of states that are customizable by material is limited to blending and related settings.

This function is called by the scene graph to get the contents of the shader program's uniform buffer updated. The implementation is not expected to perform any real graphics operations, it is merely responsible for copying data to the QByteArray returned from RenderState::uniformData(). The scene graph takes care of making that buffer visible in the shaders.
This function is called by the scene graph to indicate that geometry is about to be rendered using this shader.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数被场景图调用,以表明即将使用这个着色器渲染几何体。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph to indicate that geometry will no longer to be rendered using this shader.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数被场景图调用,表示不再使用这个着色器渲染几何体。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph to prepare using a sampled image in the shader, typically in form of a combined image sampler.
This function is called by the scene graph to return a unique instance per subclass.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数被场景图调用,以返回每个子类的唯一实例。

trans-unit.source: This function is called continuously with the given
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在给定的

trans-unit.source: This function is called during the scene graph sync phase when the GUI thread is blocked.
trans-unit.target: 当GUI线程被阻塞时,该函数在场景图同步阶段被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called for absolute URLs that are prefixed with http:// or https:// and for unrecognized schemes, such as mailto:, which will be handled by QDesktopServices if accepted. To have this function called also upon receiving navigation requests to local URLs, prefix the URLs with http://.
trans-unit.target: 对于以 http:// 或 https:// 为前缀的绝对URL 以及无法识别的方案（例如 mailto: ：），将调用此函数，如果接受，这些方案将由QDesktopServices处理。要在接收到对本地URL的导航请求时也调用此功能，请在URL前面添加 http:// 。

trans-unit.source: This function is called for every area light for the back-facing polygon.
This function is called for every area light for the front-facing polygon.

This function is called for every light (excluding area lights) for the back-facing polygon. The material can write its own lighting model or use the provided functions. The functions available for use are microfacetBSDF, physGlossyBSDF and simpleGlossyBSDF. The normal is the fragment normal. The lightDir is the normalized vector from fragment to light in world space.

This function is called for every light (excluding area lights) for the front-facing polygon. The material can write its own lighting model or use the provided functions. The functions available for use are microfacetBSDF, physGlossyBSDF, and simpleGlossyBSDF. The normal is the fragment normal. The lightDir is the normalized vector from fragment to light in world space.

This function is called once to calculate the environmental light for the front-facing polygon.

This function is called only if the material is transparent and non-transmissive after computeLayerWeights has been called.
This function is called to allow the material to initialize layer parameters.
This function is called to begin a transaction. If successful, return true, otherwise return false. The default implementation does nothing and returns false.

trans-unit.target: 调用此函数来提交事务。如果成功，则返回true，否则返回false。默认实现不执行任何操作，并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: This function is mostly useful to pass a byte array to a function that accepts a const char *.
trans-unit.target: 该函数在将字节数组传递给接受 const char * 的函数时最有用。

trans-unit.source: This function is mostly useful to pass a vector to a function that accepts a plain C++ array.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数主要用于将一个向量传递给一个接受普通C++数组的函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is mostly useful to pass an array to a function that accepts a plain C++ array.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数主要用于将一个数组传递给一个接受普通C++数组的函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is non-blocking and ideally should be used to check for the availability of the query result before calling waitForResult().
trans-unit.target: 此函数是非阻塞的，理想情况下，应在调用waitForResult（）之前使用该函数检查查询结果的可用性。

trans-unit.source: This function is not available if the remote call returns void.
trans-unit.target: 如果远程调用返回 void ,则此功能不可用。

trans-unit.source: This function is not available in Qt 5.x until 5.0.2 and will return NULL in earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在5.0.2之前的Qt 5.x中是不可用的,在早期版本中会返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: This function is not available in Qt 5.x until 5.0.2 and will return a null pixmap in earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在5.0.2之前的Qt 5.x中是不可用的,在早期的版本中会返回一个null的pixmap。

trans-unit.source: This function is not available when QT_NO_CAST_FROM_ASCII is defined.
trans-unit.target: 定义 QT_NO_CAST_FROM_ASCII 时，此功能不可用。

trans-unit.source: This function is not called for empty model indices, i.e., indices for which the model returns an invalid QVariant.
trans-unit.target: 对于空的模型索引，即模型返回无效QVariant的索引，不会调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is not commonly used and is expected to be slow.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不常用,预计速度较慢。

trans-unit.source: This function is not usually called in application code. To add a widget to a layout, use the addWidget() function; to add a child layout, use the addLayout() function provided by the relevant QLayout subclass.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序代码中通常不调用此函数。要将小部件添加到布局，请使用addWidget（）函数；要添加子布局，请使用相关QLayout子类提供的addLayout（）函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is not virtual. You can use alternative translation techniques by subclassing QTranslator.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不是虚拟的。您可以通过子类化QTranslator来使用其他翻译技术。

trans-unit.source: This function is often called in conjunction with the readyRead() signal.
trans-unit.target: 通常将此函数与readyRead（）信号一起调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is only applicable to the X11 version of Qt. If no creator name is specified, the creator will be set to "Qt" followed by some version number.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数只适用于X11版本的Qt。如果没有指定创建者名称,创建者将被设置为 "Qt",后面跟着一些版本号。

trans-unit.source: This function is only available if the program is being compiled in C++11 mode.
trans-unit.target: 该功能只有在程序以C++11模式编译时才可用。

trans-unit.source: This function is only available in OpenGL ES 3.x, or OpenGL 3.x or 4.x contexts. When running with plain OpenGL, the function is only usable when the given profile and version contains the function either in core or as an extension.
trans-unit.target: 该函数仅在OpenGL ES 3.x或OpenGL 3.x或4.x背景下可用。当使用普通OpenGL运行时,只有当给定的配置文件和版本在核心中包含该函数或作为扩展时,该函数才可用。

trans-unit.source: This function is only called if the result is in an active state. Derived classes must reimplement this function and position the result to the first record, and call setAt() with an appropriate value. Return true to indicate success, or false to signify failure.
trans-unit.target: 仅当结果处于活动状态时才调用此函数。派生类必须重新实现此函数，并将结果定位到第一条记录，并使用适当的值调用setAt（）。返回true表示成功，返回false表示失败。

trans-unit.source: This function is only called if the result is in an active state. Derived classes must reimplement this function and position the result to the last record, and call setAt() with an appropriate value. Return true to indicate success, or false to signify failure.
trans-unit.target: 仅当结果处于活动状态时才调用此函数。派生类必须重新实现此函数并将结果定位到最后一条记录，并使用适当的值调用setAt（）。返回true表示成功，返回false表示失败。

trans-unit.source: This function is only called if the result is in an active state. Derived classes must reimplement this function and position the result to the row
trans-unit.target: 这个函数只有在结果处于活动状态时才会被调用。衍生类必须重新实现这个函数,并将结果定位到行上。

trans-unit.source: This function is only called if the result is in an active state. The default implementation calls fetch() with the next index. Derived classes can reimplement this function and position the result to the next record in some other way, and call setAt() with an appropriate value. Return true to indicate success, or false to signify failure.
trans-unit.target: 仅当结果处于活动状态时才调用此函数。默认实现使用下一个索引调用fetch（）。派生的类可以重新实现此函数，并以其他方式将结果定位到下一条记录，然后使用适当的值调用setAt（）。返回true表示成功，返回false表示失败。

trans-unit.source: This function is only called if the result is in an active state. The default implementation calls fetch() with the previous index. Derived classes can reimplement this function and position the result to the next record in some other way, and call setAt() with an appropriate value. Return true to indicate success, or false to signify failure.
trans-unit.target: 仅当结果处于活动状态时才调用此函数。默认实现使用上一个索引调用fetch（）。派生的类可以重新实现此函数，并以其他方式将结果定位到下一条记录，然后使用适当的值调用setAt（）。返回true表示成功，返回false表示失败。

trans-unit.source: This function is only reliable for visible objects (invisible objects might not be laid out correctly).

trans-unit.source: This function performs the same operation as clicking the mouse on the title bar of a top-level window. On X11, the result depends on the Window Manager. If you want to ensure that the window is stacked on top as well you should also call raise(). Note that the window must be visible, otherwise activateWindow() has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 该功能执行与在顶级窗口的标题栏上单击鼠标相同的操作。在X11上，结果取决于Window Manager。如果要确保窗口也堆叠在顶部，则还应该调用raise（）。请注意，该窗口必须可见，否则activateWindow（）无效。

trans-unit.source: This function produces the equivalent representation of the stream that toCbor() would produce, without any transformation option provided there. This also implies this function may not produce a representation of the stream that was used to create the object, if it was created using fromCbor(), as that function may have applied transformations. For a high-fidelity notation of a stream, without transformation, see the cbordump example.
trans-unit.target: 此函数产生与toCbor（）会产生的流的等效表示形式，但没有提供任何转换选项。这也意味着如果使用fromCbor（）创建了该函数，则该函数可能不会生成用于创建对象的流的表示，因为该函数可能已应用了转换。有关未经转换的流的高保真表示法，请参见 cbordump 示例。

trans-unit.source: This function protects a module from having types registered into it. This can be used to prevent other plugins from injecting types into your module. It can also be a performance improvement, as it allows the engine to skip checking for the possibility of new types or plugins when this import is reached.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能可以保护一个模块的类型不被注册。这可以用来防止其他插件将类型注入到你的模块中。它也可以是一种性能改进,因为它允许引擎在达到这个导入时跳过检查新类型或插件的可能性。

trans-unit.source: This function provides a consistent interface that model subclasses must use to create model indexes.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数提供了一个一致的接口,模型子类必须用来创建模型索引。

trans-unit.source: This function provides a way to customize the behavior of openUrl(). If openUrl() is called with a URL with the specified
trans-unit.target: 此函数提供了一种自定义openUrl（）行为的方法。如果使用带有指定URL的URL调用openUrl（）

trans-unit.source: This function provides access to the QOpenGLContext's underlying native context. The returned variant contains a platform-specific value type. These classes can be found in the module QtPlatformHeaders.
trans-unit.target: 此函数提供对QOpenGLContext的基础本机上下文的访问。返回的变体包含特定于平台的值类型。这些类可以在模块QtPlatformHeaders中找到。

trans-unit.source: This function provides access to the QOpenGLContext's underlying native context. The returned variant contains a platform-specific value type. These classes can be found in the module QtPlatformHeaders.

This function provides an alternative way of doing approximated comparisons of floating-point numbers similar to qFuzzyCompare(). However, it returns the distance between two numbers, which gives the caller a possibility to choose the accepted error. Errors are relative, so for instance the distance between 1.0E-5 and 1.00001E-5 will give 110, while the distance between 1.0E36 and 1.00001E36 will give 127.
trans-unit.target: 该函数提供了一种替代方法，可以对浮点数进行近似比较，类似于qFuzzyCompare（）。但是，它返回两个数字之间的距离，这使呼叫者可以选择可接受的错误。误差是相对的，因此例如1.0E-5和1.00001E-5之间的距离为110，而1.0E36和1.00001E36之间的距离为127。

trans-unit.source: This function provides more efficient support for populating new items.
trans-unit.target: 该功能为填充新项目提供了更有效的支持。

trans-unit.source: This function provides the CA certificate database provided by the operating system. The CA certificate database returned by this function is used to initialize the database returned by caCertificates() on the default QSslConfiguration.
trans-unit.target: 该功能提供操作系统提供的CA证书数据库。此函数返回的CA证书数据库用于在默认QSslConfiguration上初始化由caCertificates（）返回的数据库。

trans-unit.source: This function resends the QScrollPrepareEvent. Calling resendPrepareEvent triggers a QScrollPrepareEvent from the scroller. This allows the receiver to re-set content position and content size while scrolling. Calling this function while in the Inactive state is useless as the prepare event is sent again before scrolling starts.
trans-unit.target: 此函数重新发送QScrollPrepareEvent。调用resendPrepareEvent会触发滚动条中的QScrollPrepareEvent。这允许接收器在滚动时重新设置内容位置和内容大小。在Inactive状态下调用此函数是没有用的，因为在滚动开始之前会再次发送prepare事件。

trans-unit.source: This function returns -1 if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生错误,该函数返回-1。

trans-unit.source: This function returns -1 if the prefix length could not be determined (i.e., netmask() returns a null QHostAddress()).
trans-unit.target: 如果无法确定前缀长度，则此函数返回-1（即netmask（）返回空的QHostAddress（））。

trans-unit.source: This function returns 0 if no tests failed, or a value other than 0 if one or more tests failed or in case of unhandled exceptions. (Skipped tests do not influence the return value.)
trans-unit.target: 如果没有测试失败,该函数返回0;如果有一个或多个测试失败或出现未处理的异常,则返回0以外的值。(跳过的测试不会影响返回值。)

trans-unit.source: This function returns false if the stack is empty or if the top command on the stack has already been redone.
trans-unit.target: 如果堆栈为空，或者已经重做了堆栈上的top命令，则此函数返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: This function returns false if the stack is empty, or if the bottom command on the stack has already been undone.
trans-unit.target: 如果堆栈为空，或者堆栈上的底部命令已经撤消，则此函数返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: This function returns nullptr if no application cursor has been defined (i.e. the internal cursor stack is empty).
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义应用程序游标（即内部游标堆栈为空），则此函数返回 nullptr 。

trans-unit.source: This function returns true if any services were removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果删除了任何服务，此函数将返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This function returns true if successful; otherwise it returns false and sets the socket error accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，此函数返回 true ；否则，返回true。否则返回 false 并相应地设置套接字错误。

trans-unit.source: This function returns true if the contents of the MIME data object, specified by
trans-unit.target: 如果MIME数据对象的内容由指定，则此函数返回 true

trans-unit.source: This function returns true if the event was recognized, otherwise it returns false. If the recognized event was accepted (see QEvent::accepted), any further processing such as event propagation to the parent widget stops.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件被识别，则此函数返回 true ，否则返回 false 。如果识别的事件被接受（请参见QEvent :: accepted），则任何进一步的处理（例如，事件传播到父窗口小部件）都将停止。

trans-unit.source: This function returns true if the information could be successfully retrieved, false if the lock file doesn't exist or doesn't contain the expected data. This can happen if the lock file was deleted between the time where tryLock() failed and the call to this function. Simply call tryLock() again if this happens.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以成功检索到信息，则此函数返回 true ;如果锁定文件不存在或不包含预期数据，则返回false。如果在tryLock（）失败到对此函数的调用之间删除了锁定文件，则会发生这种情况。如果发生这种情况，只需再次调用tryLock（）。

trans-unit.source: This function returns true if the queueing succeeded: it does not indicate that the call succeeded. If it failed, the slot will be called with an error message. lastError() will not be set under those circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 如果排队成功，此函数将返回 true ：它并不表示调用成功。如果失败，将通过错误消息调用该插槽。在这种情况下，不会设置lastError（）。

trans-unit.source: This function returns true if the queueing succeeds. It does not indicate that the executed call succeeded. If it fails, the
trans-unit.target: 如果排队成功，此函数将返回 true 。它并不表示执行的调用成功。如果失败，则

trans-unit.source: This function returns true when the peeker has stopped the event proccesing by returning true from the callback. If there were no events in the buffered native event queue to peek at or all the events have been processed by the peeker, this function returns false.
trans-unit.target: 当偷窥者通过从回调返回 true 来停止事件处理时，此函数返回 true 。如果在缓冲的本机事件队列中没有要监视的事件，或者所有事件已由监视者处理，则此函数返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: This function returns Online Certificate Status Protocol responses that a server may send during a TLS handshake using OCSP stapling. The vector is empty if no definitive response or no response at all was received.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回服务器在使用OCSP钉书机进行TLS握手时可能发送的在线证书状态协议响应。如果没有收到明确的响应或者没有收到任何响应,则向量为空。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a QDBusMessage object that can be sent with QDBusConnection::call().
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回一个QDBusMessage对象，该对象可以与QDBusConnection :: call（）发送。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a block to test for the end of the document while iterating over it.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回一个块,用于在迭代文档时测试文档的结束。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a bytearray that can be used to query QGuiApplication::platformFunction() to retrieve the SetWindowActivationBehaviorType function.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回一个字节数组，可用于查询QGuiApplication :: platformFunction（）以检索SetWindowActivationBehaviorType函数。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a certificate used to sign OCSP response.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回用于签署OCSP响应的证书。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a certificate, for which this response was issued.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回一个证书,这个证书的响应是为其签发的。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a const pointer, because modifying a command, once it has been pushed onto the stack and executed, almost always causes corruption of the state of the document, if the command is later undone or redone.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回一个const指针,因为修改一个命令,一旦它被推到堆栈上并被执行,几乎总是会导致文档状态的破坏,如果该命令后来被撤销或重做。

trans-unit.target: 此函数返回当前纹理的副本,并从其图谱中删除。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a list of pointers to the contents of the selected cells. Use the selectedIndexes() function to retrieve the complete selection
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回指向所选单元格内容的指针列表。使用selectedIndexes（）函数检索完整的选择

trans-unit.source: This function returns a new MIME data object to represent the contents of the text edit's current selection. It is called when the selection needs to be encapsulated into a new QMimeData object; for example, when a drag and drop operation is started, or when data is copied to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回一个新的MIME数据对象，以表示文本编辑的当前选择内容。当选择需要封装到新的QMimeData对象中时，将调用此方法。例如，当开始拖放操作或将数据复制到剪贴板时。

trans-unit.source: This function returns immediately. The event is added to the state machine's event queue. Events are processed in the order posted. The state machine takes ownership of the event and deletes it once it has been processed.

trans-unit.source: This function returns the character position at

This function returns the character position at x and y pixels from the top left of the textInput. Position 0 is before the first character, position 1 is after the first character but before the second, and so on until position text.length, which is after all characters.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回从textInput左上方x和y像素处的字符位置。位置0在第一个字符之前,位置1在第一个字符之后但在第二个字符之前,以此类推,直到位置text.length,即所有字符之后。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the current proxy for this style. By default most styles will return themselves. However when a proxy style is in use, it will allow the style to call back into its proxy.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回当前这个样式的代理。默认情况下,大多数样式会返回自己。但是当一个代理样式被使用时,它将允许该样式调用回它的代理。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the discovery methods supported by the current platform. It can be used to limit the scope of the device discovery.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回当前平台支持的发现方法。它可以用来限制设备发现的范围。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the engine to a state where it does not contain any loaded component data. This may be useful in order to reload a smaller subset of the previous component set, or to load a new version of a previously loaded component.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将引擎返回到不包含任何加载组件数据的状态。这对于重新加载之前组件集的一个较小的子集,或者加载之前加载的组件的新版本可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the floating point number which has been entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回用户输入的浮点数。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the imported node that belongs to this document. The returned node has no parent. It is not possible to import QDomDocument and QDomDocumentType nodes. In those cases this function returns a null node.
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回属于此文档的导入节点。返回的节点没有父节点。无法导入QDomDocument和QDomDocumentType节点。在这种情况下，此函数返回一个空节点。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the protocol negotiated with the server if the Next Protocol Negotiation (NPN) or Application-Layer Protocol Negotiation (ALPN) TLS extension was enabled. In order for the NPN/ALPN extension to be enabled, setAllowedNextProtocols() needs to be called explicitly before connecting to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了下一个协议协商（NPN）或应用程序层协议协商（ALPN）TLS扩展，则此函数返回与服务器协商的协议。为了启用NPN / ALPN扩展，需要在连接到服务器之前显式调用setAllowedNextProtocols（）。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the relative document order for the nodes indexed by
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回由下面索引的节点的相对文档顺序。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the root of the context hierarchy. Each QML component is instantiated in a QQmlContext. QQmlContext's are essential for passing data to QML components. In QML, contexts are arranged hierarchically and this hierarchy is managed by the QQmlEngine.
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回上下文层次结构的根。每个QML组件都在QQmlContext中实例化。QQmlContext对于将数据传递到QML组件至关重要。在QML中，上下文按层次结构排列，并且此层次结构由QQmlEngine管理。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the same as filePath(), unless isRelative() is true. In contrast to canonicalFilePath(), symbolic links or redundant "." or ".." elements are not necessarily removed.
trans-unit.target: 除非isRelative（）为true ，否则此函数返回的文件路径与filePath（）相同。与canonicalFilePath（）相反，符号链接或冗余“”。或“ ..”元素不一定要删除。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the same as QHostInfo::localHostName().
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回与QHostInfo :: localHostName（）相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the same as QSysInfo::machineHostName().
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回与QSysInfo :: machineHostName（）相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the same as toRawText(), but will replace some unicode characters with ASCII alternatives. In particular, no-break space (U+00A0) is replaced by a regular space (U+0020), and both paragraph (U+2029) and line (U+2028) separators are replaced by line feed (U+000A). If you need the precise contents of the document, use toRawText() instead.
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回的结果与toRawText（）相同，但是将某些Unicode字符替换为ASCII替代字符。特别是，不间断空格（U + 00A0）替换为常规空格（U + 0020），段落（U + 2029）和行（U + 2028）分隔符都替换为换行（U + 000A） 。如果您需要文档的确切内容，请使用toRawText（）。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the same value as the QML type registration functions such as qmlRegisterType() and qmlRegisterSingletonType().
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回与QML类型注册函数（例如qmlRegisterType（）和qmlRegisterSingletonType（））相同的值。

trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回给定的字形在给定的位置上的形状。

trans-unit.source: This function returns true if all the checks succeeded, and false otherwise. This allows to use the function in Q_ASSERT and similar other debugging mechanisms. If some check failed, a warning message will be printed in the qt.core.qabstractitemmodel.checkindex logging category, containing some information that may be useful for debugging the failure.

trans-unit.source: This function should be called as late as possible before sync(). In a threaded scenario, rendering can happen in parallel with this function.

This function should be called if you are implementing custom filtering (e.g. filterAcceptsRow()), and your filter parameters have changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果要实现自定义过滤（例如filterAcceptsRow（）），并且您的过滤器参数已更改，则应调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function should be called to enable the Drag and Drop events for custom pasteboard types on Cocoa implementations. This is required in addition to a QMacPasteboardMime subclass implementation. By default drag and drop is enabled for all standard pasteboard types.
trans-unit.target: 应该调用此函数来为Cocoa实现上的自定义粘贴板类型启用拖放事件。除了QMacPasteboardMime子类实现之外，这也是必需的。默认情况下，所有标准粘贴板类型都启用拖放功能。

trans-unit.source: This function should be called when there is a need to postpone the decision whether to ignore a certificate error, for example, while waiting for user input. When called, the function pauses the URL request until WebEngineCertificateError::ignoreCertificateError() or WebEngineCertificateError::rejectCertificate() is called.
trans-unit.target: 当需要推迟是否忽略证书错误的决定时，例如在等待用户输入时，应调用此函数。调用后，函数将暂停URL请求，直到调用WebEngineCertificateError :: ignoreCertificateError（）或WebEngineCertificateError :: rejectCertificate（）为止。

trans-unit.source: This function should be called when there is a need to postpone the decision whether to ignore a certificate error, for example, while waiting for user input. When called, the function pauses the URL request until ignoreCertificateError() or rejectCertificate() is called.

trans-unit.target: 当类型不通过名称引用时,应该使用这个函数。具体来说,它必须用于作为属性绑定左手边的C++类型。

trans-unit.source: This function should not be used when the toolbar is managed by QMainWindow. You can use QMainWindow::addToolBar() or QMainWindow::insertToolBar() if you wish to move a toolbar that is already added to a main window to another Qt::ToolBarArea.
trans-unit.target: 当工具栏由QMainWindow管理时，不应使用此功能。如果希望将已经添加到主窗口的工具栏移动到另一个Qt :: ToolBarArea，则可以使用QMainWindow :: addToolBar（）或QMainWindow :: insertToolBar（）。

trans-unit.source: This function should only be called from QGraphicsEffect::draw().
trans-unit.target: 仅应从QGraphicsEffect :: draw（）调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function should only be called if the application has been started by the user (i.e. not by COM to respond to a request), and only for one object, usually the toplevel object of the application's object hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数只有在应用程序已经被用户启动的情况下才应该被调用(即不是通过COM来响应请求),而且只能针对一个对象,通常是应用程序对象层次结构中的toplevel对象。

trans-unit.source: This function should only be used if the XML header either says the encoding is "UTF-8" or lacks any encoding information (the latter is the case of QXmlStreamWriter writing to a QString). Any other encoding is likely going to cause data corruption ("mojibake").
trans-unit.target: 仅当XML标头说明编码为“ UTF-8”或缺少任何编码信息时才应使用此函数（后者是QXmlStreamWriter写入QString的情况）。任何其他编码都可能会导致数据损坏（“ mojibake”）。

trans-unit.source: This function will attempt to construct a QGeoCodingManager instance when it is called for the first time. If the attempt is successful the QGeoCodingManager will be cached, otherwise each call of this function will attempt to construct a QGeoCodingManager instance until the construction is successful.
trans-unit.target: 首次调用时，此函数将尝试构造QGeoCodingManager实例。如果尝试成功，则将缓存QGeoCodingManager，否则每次调用此函数都会尝试构造QGeoCodingManager实例，直到构造成功。

trans-unit.source: This function will attempt to construct a QGeoRoutingManager instance when it is called for the first time. If the attempt is successful the QGeoRoutingManager will be cached, otherwise each call of this function will attempt to construct a QGeoRoutingManager instance until the construction is successful.
trans-unit.target: 首次调用时，此函数将尝试构造QGeoRoutingManager实例。如果尝试成功，则将缓存QGeoRoutingManager，否则每次调用此函数都将尝试构造QGeoRoutingManager实例，直到构造成功。

trans-unit.source: This function will attempt to construct a QPlaceManager instance when it is called for the first time. If the attempt is successful the QPlaceManager will be cached, otherwise each call of this function will attempt to construct a QPlace instance until the construction is successful.
trans-unit.target: 首次调用时，此函数将尝试构造QPlaceManager实例。如果尝试成功，则将缓存QPlaceManager，否则，每次调用此函数都将尝试构造QPlace实例，直到构造成功为止。

trans-unit.source: This function will be called on the rendering thread while the GUI thread is blocked.
trans-unit.target: 当GUI线程被阻塞时,该函数将在渲染线程上被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function will block until OpenGL indicates the results are available. It is recommended to check the availability of the result prior to calling this function with isResultAvailable().
trans-unit.target: 该功能将一直阻塞，直到OpenGL指示结果可用为止。建议在使用isResultAvailable（）调用此函数之前检查结果的可用性。

trans-unit.source: This function will block until the result is made available by OpenGL. It is recommended to call isResultAvailable() to ensure that the result is available to avoid unnecessary blocking and stalling.
trans-unit.target: 该功能将一直阻塞，直到OpenGL提供结果为止。建议调用isResultAvailable（）以确保结果可用，以避免不必要的阻塞和停顿。

trans-unit.source: This function will not overwrite an already existing entity in the file system; in this case, link() will return false and set error() to return RenameError.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不会覆盖文件系统中已经存在的实体；在这种情况下， link() 将返回false并将error（）设置为返回RenameError。

trans-unit.source: This function will return 0 if no viewport bias was specified in the QGeoCodingManager function which created this reply.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建此回复的QGeoCodingManager函数中未指定视口偏差，则此函数将返回0 。

trans-unit.target: 如果服务提供者没有提供任何地理编码服务,该函数将返回0。

trans-unit.target: 如果服务提供商不提供任何地理路由服务,该函数将返回0。

trans-unit.source: This function will return false if the OpenGL implementation does not support buffers, or there is no current QOpenGLContext.
trans-unit.target: 如果OpenGL实现不支持缓冲区，或者没有当前的QOpenGLContext，则此函数将返回false 。

trans-unit.source: This function will return false until a tool such as a screen reader accessed the accessibility framework. It is still possible to use QAccessible::queryAccessibleInterface() even if accessibility is not active. But there will be no notifications sent to the platform.
trans-unit.target: 该功能将返回false，直到屏幕阅读器之类的工具访问了可访问性框架。即使可访问性未激活，仍可以使用QAccessible :: queryAccessibleInterface（）。但是不会有任何通知发送到平台。

trans-unit.source: This function will return the same as activeSubWindow() if the QApplication containing QMdiArea is active.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含QMdiArea的QApplication是活动的，则此函数将返回与activeSubWindow（）相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: This function writes as much as possible from the internal write buffer to the socket, without blocking. If any data was written, this function returns true; otherwise false is returned.

trans-unit.source: This function writes as much as possible from the internal write buffer to the underlying network socket, without blocking. If any data was written, this function returns true; otherwise false is returned.
trans-unit.target: 该函数尽可能不从内部写入缓冲区写入基础网络套接字，而不会阻塞。如果写入了任何数据，则此函数返回 true ；否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: This function writes as much as possible from the internal write buffer to the underlying network socket, without blocking. If any data was written, this function returns true; otherwise false is returned. Call this function if you need QWebSocket to start sending buffered data immediately. The number of bytes successfully written depends on the operating system. In most cases, you do not need to call this function, because QWebSocket will start sending data automatically once control goes back to the event loop.
trans-unit.target: 该函数尽可能不从内部写入缓冲区写入基础网络套接字，而不会阻塞。如果写入了任何数据，则此函数返回true；否则，返回true。否则返回false。如果需要QWebSocket立即开始发送缓冲的数据，请调用此函数。成功写入的字节数取决于操作系统。在大多数情况下，您不需要调用此函数，因为一旦控制权返回事件循环，QWebSocket将自动开始发送数据。

trans-unit.source: This function writes as much as possible from the internal write buffer to the underlying serial port without blocking. If any data was written, this function returns true; otherwise returns false.

trans-unit.source: This geo services plugin allows applications to access Mapbox location based services using the Qt Location API. The use of these services is governed by the Mapbox terms of service. An access token is required to use these services. Data is provided by OpenStreetMap and others.

trans-unit.source: This handler is called when a previously purchased unlockable product is restored. This can happen when the restorePurchases() function in the current Store is called. The onPurchaseRestored handler will then be called for each unlockable product which has previously been purchased by the user.
trans-unit.target: 恢复先前购买的可解锁产品时，将调用此处理程序。当调用当前商店中的restorePurchases（）函数时，可能会发生这种情况。然后， onPurchaseRestored 用户先前购买的每个可解锁产品调用onPurchaseRestored处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This handler is called when a product has been purchased successfully. It is triggered when the application has called purchase() on the product and the user has subsequently confirmed the purchase, for example by entering their password.
trans-unit.target: 成功购买产品后，将调用此处理程序。当应用程序已在产品上调用了purchase（），并且用户随后通过输入密码（例如输入密码）确认购买时，就会触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: This handler is called when a purchase was requested for a given product, but the purchase failed. This will typically happen if the application calls purchase() on a product, and the user subsequently cancels the purchase. It could also happen under other circumstances, for example if there is no suitable network connection.
trans-unit.target: 当请求购买给定产品但购买失败时，将调用此处理程序。如果应用程序调用产品的purchase（），并且用户随后取消购买，通常会发生这种情况。它也可能在其他情况下发生，例如，如果没有合适的网络连接。

trans-unit.source: This handler neither takes from nor gives grab permission to any type of Item or Handler.
trans-unit.target: 这个处理程序既不从任何类型的Item或处理程序那里获取权限,也不向其授予抢夺权限。

trans-unit.source: This handler will allow its grab to be set to null.
trans-unit.target: 该处理程序将允许将其抓取设置为null。

trans-unit.source: This happens, for instance, on macOS and iOS, where the system UI fonts are not accessible to the user. You should use this function if you are developing a font selection control in order to keep private fonts hidden.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在macOS和iOS 上会发生这种情况，其中用户无法访问系统UI字体。为了完整起见，QFontDatabase :: families（）返回所有字体系列，包括私有的。如果要开发字体选择控件以隐藏私有字体，则应使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: This header file provides support for half-precision (16-bit) floating point data with the class qfloat16. It is fully compliant with IEEE 754 as a storage type. This implies that any arithmetic operation on a qfloat16 instance results in the value first being converted to a float. This conversion to and from float is performed by hardware when possible, but on processors that do not natively support half-precision, the conversion is performed through a sequence of lookup table operations.
trans-unit.target: 此头文件提供对类 qfloat16 的半精度（16位）浮点数据的支持。它完全符合IEEE 754作为存储类型。这意味着对 qfloat16 实例的任何算术运算都会导致该值首先转换为 float 。在可能的情况下，这种与 float 转换是由硬件执行的，但是在本机不支持半精度的处理器上，转换是通过一系列查找表操作执行的。

trans-unit.target: 只要此输入处理程序通过排他性地抓取一个或多个EventPoint来全权负责处理一个或多个EventPoint，这都是正确的。这意味着它将根据那些事件点的移动来保持其属性为最新，并积极地操纵其目标（如果有）。

This implies that QDtlsClientVerifier does not read directly from a socket, instead it expects the application to read an incoming datagram, extract the sender's address, and port, and then pass this data to verifyClient(). To send a HelloVerifyRequest message, verifyClient() can write to the QUdpSocket.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着QDtlsClientVerifier不会直接从套接字读取，而是希望应用程序读取传入的数据报，提取发送方的地址和端口，然后将此数据传递给verifyClient（）。要发送HelloVerifyRequest消息，verifyClient（）可以写入QUdpSocket。

trans-unit.source: This import allows multiple modules which provide conflicting type names to be imported at the same time, however since each usage of a type provided by a module which was imported into a qualified namespace must be preceded by the qualifier, the conflict is able to be resolved unambiguously by the QML engine.

trans-unit.source: This interface corresponds to the IAccessibleText interface. It should be implemented for widgets that display more text than a plain label. Labels should be represented by only QAccessibleInterface and return their text as name (QAccessibleInterface::text() with QAccessible::Name as type). The QAccessibleTextInterface is typically for text that a screen reader might want to read line by line, and for widgets that support text selection and input. This interface is, for example, implemented for QLineEdit.
trans-unit.target: 该接口对应于IAccessibleText接口。应该为显示比纯标签更多文本的窗口小部件实现该功能。标签应仅由QAccessibleInterface表示，并以名称返回其文本（QAccessibleInterface :: text（），QAccessible :: Name为类型）。该QAccessibleTextInterface通常是文本屏幕阅读器可能要逐行读取，以及小工具，支持文字选择和输入。例如，此接口是为QLineEdit实现的。

trans-unit.target: 这是一项便利功能。它等效于调用属性（QBluetoothServiceInfo :: ServiceAvailability）.toUInt（）。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience function. It is equivalent to calling attribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceClassIds).value<QBluetoothServiceInfo::Sequence>() and subsequently iterating over its QBluetoothUuid entries.
trans-unit.target: 这是一项便利功能。它等效于调用attribute（QBluetoothServiceInfo :: ServiceClassIds）.value < QBluetoothServiceInfo :: Sequence >（），然后迭代其QBluetoothUuid条目。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience function. It is equivalent to calling attribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceDescription).toString().
trans-unit.target: 这是一项便利功能。它等效于调用属性（QBluetoothServiceInfo :: ServiceDescription）.toString（）。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience function. It is equivalent to calling attribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceId).value<QBluetoothUuid>().
trans-unit.target: 这是一项便利功能。它等效于调用attribute（QBluetoothServiceInfo :: ServiceId）.value < QBluetoothUuid >（）。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience function. It is equivalent to calling attribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceName).toString().
trans-unit.target: 这是一项便利功能。它等效于调用attribute（QBluetoothServiceInfo :: ServiceName）.toString（）。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience function. It is equivalent to calling attribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceProvider).toString().
trans-unit.target: 这是一项便利功能。它等效于调用attribute（QBluetoothServiceInfo :: ServiceProvider）.toString（）。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience function. Returns the protocol/service multiplexer for services which support the L2CAP protocol, otherwise returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个方便的函数,对于支持L2CAP协议的服务,返回协议/服务复用器,否则返回-1。返回支持L2CAP协议的服务的协议/服务复用器,否则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience function. Returns the server channel for services which support the RFCOMM protocol, otherwise returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个方便的函数。返回支持 RFCOMM 协议的服务的服务器通道,否则返回 -1。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience function; the member variables can also be initialized manually.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个方便函数,成员变量也可以手动初始化。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience method combining quadToSquare() and squareToQuad() methods. It allows the input quad to be transformed into any other quad.
trans-unit.target: 这是结合了quadToSquare（）和squareToQuad（）方法的便捷方法。它允许将输入四边形转换为任何其他四边形。

This is a convenience method that helps out plugins doing dynamic registration.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个方便的方法,可以帮助插件进行动态注册。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience method, and is equivalent to calling stop() and then start().
trans-unit.target: 这是一种方便的方法，等效于调用 stop() 然后再调用 start() 。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience property equivalent to pressed && containsMouse, i.e. it holds whether any of the acceptedButtons are currently pressed and the mouse is currently within the MouseArea.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个便捷属性，等同于 pressed && containsMouse ，即它保存是否当前按下了任何acceptedButtons，以及鼠标当前是否位于MouseArea中。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience property for modifying the color of the brush.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个方便的属性,用于修改画笔的颜色。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience property for modifying the color of the pen.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个方便修改笔的颜色的属性。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience property that's simply the average of the logicalDotsPerInchX and logicalDotsPerInchY properties.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个便捷属性，仅是logicalDotsPerInchX和logicalDotsPerInchY属性的平均值。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience property that's simply the average of the physicalDotsPerInchX and physicalDotsPerInchY properties.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个便捷属性，仅是physicalDotsPerInchX和physicalDotsPerInchY属性的平均值。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience slot that calls activate(Hover).
trans-unit.target: 这是一个调用activate(Hover)的便利槽。
